languages.text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The creature makes 2 + (AGI Bonus / 4) melee attacks against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Every time an Attack hits, the creature gets 1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodstained{/g}.

The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Совершает 2 + (AGI Bonus / 4) мили-атак, нанося 50% от стандартного урона по случайным целям (союзникам и противникам). Каждый успешный удар накладывает на мастера культа 1 стак Bloodsoaked. Не идет в учет атак.

languages.text: Висирь совершает <u>(2 + бонус ЛВК / 4)</u> ударов в ближнем бою против случайных целей (включая союзников) на соседних клетках. Каждый удар наносит 50% от обычного урона. За каждое попадание Висирь получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Висирь совершает <u>(2 + бонус ЛВК / 4)</u> ударов в ближнем бою против случайных целей (включая союзников) на соседних клетках. Каждый удар наносит 50% от обычного урона. За каждое попадание Висирь получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g}.

Висирь совершает <u>(2 + бонус ЛВК / 4)</u> ударов в ближнем бою против случайных целей (включая союзников) на соседних клетках. Каждый удар наносит 50% от обычного урона. За каждое попадание Висирь получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g}.

languages.text: El Visir efectúa <u>(2 + bonificación por AGI / 4)</u> ataques cuerpo a cuerpo contra objetivos aleatorios (incluidos sus aliados) que estén adyacentes a él. Cada uno de estos ataques inflige un 50 % de su daño normal y cada impacto otorga al Visir +1 acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El Visir efectúa <u>(2 + bonificación por AGI / 4)</u> ataques cuerpo a cuerpo contra objetivos aleatorios (incluidos sus aliados) que estén adyacentes a él. Cada uno de estos ataques inflige un 50 % de su daño normal y cada impacto otorga al Visir +1 acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g}.

languages.text: ヴィジールは自身に隣接するランダムな対象（味方を含む）に対して<u>(2 + AGIボーナス/4)</u>の近接攻撃を行い、それぞれ通常の50%のダメージを与える。各ヒットはヴィジールに+1スタックの{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ヴィジールは自身に隣接するランダムな対象（味方を含む）に対して<u>(2 + AGIボーナス/4)</u>の近接攻撃を行い、それぞれ通常の50%のダメージを与える。各ヒットはヴィジールに+1スタックの{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を与える。

languages.text: 宿老对邻近随机目标（包括盟友在内）进行<u>（2+敏捷加值/4）</u>次近战攻击，每次攻击造成正常伤害的50%。每次命中目标时，宿老都会获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 宿老对邻近随机目标（包括盟友在内）进行<u>（2+敏捷加值/4）</u>次近战攻击，每次攻击造成正常伤害的50%。每次命中目标时，宿老都会获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果。

languages.text: Der Wesir attackiert zufällige Ziele (Verbündete eingeschlossen) auf angrenzenden Zellen mit <u>(2 + BEW-Bonus / 4)</u> Nahkampfangriffen, die jeweils 50 % ihres normalen Schadens verursachen. Jeder Treffer gewährt dem Wesir +1 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Wesir attackiert zufällige Ziele (Verbündete eingeschlossen) auf angrenzenden Zellen mit <u>(2 + BEW-Bonus / 4)</u> Nahkampfangriffen, die jeweils 50 % ihres normalen Schadens verursachen. Jeder Treffer gewährt dem Wesir +1 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}.

languages.text: Le vizir effectue <u>(2 + bonus d'AGI / 4)</u> attaques de mêlée contre des cibles aléatoires (y compris ses alliés) adjacentes, chacune infligeant 50 % de ses dégâts normaux et conférant au vizir +1 cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le vizir effectue <u>(2 + bonus d'AGI / 4)</u> attaques de mêlée contre des cibles aléatoires (y compris ses alliés) adjacentes, chacune infligeant 50 % de ses dégâts normaux et conférant au vizir +1 cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}.

Le vizir effectue <u>(2 + bonus d'AGI / 4)</u> attaques de mêlée contre des cibles aléatoires (y compris ses alliés) adjacentes, chacune infligeant 50 % de ses dégâts normaux et conférant au vizir +1 cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}.

languages.text: Vezir, bitişiğindeki hedeflere rastgele (dost birimler de dâhil) <u>(2 + ÇEV bonusu / 4)</u> yakın dövüş atağı gerçekleştirir. Her bir atak, normal hasarının %50'sini verir. Her vuruş, Vezir'e +1 {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} birikimi kazandırır.
languages.original_text: The Vizsier makes <u>(2 + AGI bonus / 4)</u> melee strikes against random targets (including allies) adjacent to him, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Each hit grants the Vizsier +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}.
